title: Create Workspaces With Multiple Readers and Writers

questions.question: Which of the following is not a valid way to add a reader or writer to your workspace?
options: Dragging and dropping a file onto the canvas
Readers > Add Reader or Writers > Add Writer

questions.question: Updating readers can be used to update the reader technology to a new version if you have upgraded FME and/or to reload the dataset to add new feature types.
Some reader parameters affect how feature types are created. Therefore, they can only be set when adding the reader.
